column4: where's GDM resolution set? is it controlled by xorg.conf or... ?
argh. then why is my resolution flubbed.  <gets cranky>
it happened after X crashed a few weeks ago. i shouldnt care because i'm seeing it for all of like 3 seconds but at the same time, grr
and it had happened before and i seemed to fix it by copying xorg.conf over from another gutsy install. but even that isnt helping now.
